text: Club Sport Marítimo, mostly known as Marítimo, was a football team from Caracas, Venezuela. The club was founded in 1959 by Portuguese immigrants living in Caracas, who based their new club on their favourite team from back home, CS Marítimo, from the island of Madeira, who today compete in the Superliga. The club was dissolved in 1995. == Achievements == *Primera División Venezolana: 4 ::1986/87, 1987/88, 1989/90, 1992/93 *Segunda División Venezolana: 2 ::1985, 2003/04 *Copa de Venezuela: 2 ::1988, 1989 == Performance in CONMEBOL competitions == *Copa Libertadores: 5 appearances ::1988: First Round ::1989: First Round ::1991: First Round ::1992: Round of 16 ::1994: First Round *Copa CONMEBOL: 1 appearance ::1992: First Round ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1959 Category:Football clubs in Venezuela Category:Football clubs in Caracas Category:1959 establishments in Venezuela Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 1995 Category:1995 disestablishments in Venezuela
title: C.S. Marítimo de Venezuela
